description: [Latrodectus](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1160) can create scheduled tasks for persistence.(Citation: Latrodectus APR 2024)(Citation: Elastic Latrodectus May 2024)(Citation: Bitsight Latrodectus June 2024)
